name: Snow Dream (Christmas game)
description:
First of all, this is a Vietnamese game made by all members in GameDev Club at HCMUT (HCM city University of Technology).

This is the first time our team released such a big game, so there may be some silly bugs or features in the game which will probably annoying you guys. Forgive me.

We found it unnecessary to make a tutorial in game since it's gonna fun and enjoyable for gamers to explore the game by themselves.

Anyway, feel free to enjoy the game and thanks for supporting me.
